text:
Good day CMCG community, elated to finally be part of this community.

I have only heard good things about CMCG from <@U01EBT43ERH> and I appreciate that he extended the invite to join. In the context of this group, I am currently a branding and marketing consultant with a focus on social media and content marketing. I have predominantly worked in the B2C space, but have recently been steering more towards B2B (and B2P... if that's an acceptible 'word' here).

I am fascinated by the art and science of our industry and I hope to find elements of both in this group that I can fuse together to help propel my knowledge and understanding forward. I an eager to discovering more, learning much and hopefully, in time, be able to contribute to this community as well. Thank you for the oppertunity.
